text: A Sense of Reality is a collection of short stories by Graham Greene, first published in 1963. The book is composed of three short stories and a novella, Under the Garden. These stories share a marked change of style from Greene’s usual format, with the author plunging into fantasy, dreams, false memories and imagination. ==Stories== *Under the Garden *A Visit to Morin *Dream of a Strange Land *A Discovery in the Woods ==References== Category:Single-writer short story collections Category:Books by Graham Greene Category:1963 short story collections Category:The Bodley Head books
title: A Sense of Reality
